<JD_START>
Job Title: 24/25 Special Ed. Teacher *Up to $2000/Weekly

Location: Casa Grande, AZ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Education, Training

Description:
Job Description

Position: Local Special Education Teacher

Location: Goodyear, AZ

Contract Length: 24-25 School Year

Compensation: Up to $2000/week based on experience

Connected Health Care, a trusted recruitment and staffing firm, is seeking a compassionate Local Special Education Teacher to join our client's team in Goodyear, AZ. If you're passionate about empowering students with special needs and thrive in a collaborative educational environment, apply today and become part of a team dedicated to making a difference!

Job Description:

Develop and implement personalized education plans for students with special needs, addressing their individual learning styles and abilities Create a supportive and inclusive classroom environment where all students feel valued and respected Collaborate with colleagues, parents, and support staff to ensure each student receives the necessary accommodations and support to succeed Utilize innovative teaching strategies, technologies, and resources to engage students and enhance their learning experiences Monitor student progress through ongoing assessment and adjust instruction as needed to facilitate growth and development 

Education And Certification Requirements:

Bachelor's degree in Special Education or related field Arizona teaching certification in Special Education Previous experience working with diverse student populations preferred 

About Goodyear, AZ: Located in the picturesque Sonoran Desert, Goodyear offers a perfect blend of natural beauty and modern amenities. Residents enjoy a variety of outdoor recreational activities, including hiking, biking, and golfing, amid stunning desert landscapes and scenic mountain views. The city boasts a thriving arts and culture scene, with galleries, theaters, and live music venues showcasing local talent and creativity. Goodyear is also home to top-rated schools, family-friendly neighborhoods, and a strong sense of community spirit, making it an ideal place to live, work, and raise a family.

Apply today to become a Local Special Education Teacher in Goodyear, AZ, and join a dedicated team committed to providing exceptional education and support to students with special needs. Take the next step in your career and make a positive impact in the lives of students. Apply now!

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
<JD_END>
